title: A Storm of Desire
description:
Librarian's note: This is an alternate cover edition for ASIN: B00AJMYTYC.Prince Alexander Kuzan of Russia can't believe his luck when he stumbles upon gorgeous redhead Zena Turku, in flight from an unwanted suitor. The prince offers to secretly transport her to her native home in the Caucasus Mountains and Zena hastily agrees. What she doesn't know is that Prince Alexander has casually assumed she's just another harlot – the perfect distraction for the weary journey ahead. As he sets about trying to conquer her body, Alexander begins to realize his mistake. As their understanding deepens, Alexander's feelings for Zena take an unexpected, and even sinister, turn.C.C. Gibbs was born and lives in the USA. She is the author of over 40 romance and erotica novels, including the recent bestsellers Knight’s Mistress and Knight’s Game. Many of her novels were originally published under the name Susan Johnson.
This book is intended for mature audiences.
author: Susan Johnson
